page.title: 20Sporting Activities
page.content: Football and cricket are favourite activities for the children of Great Horwood, there are both Football and Cricket clubs in the village.Indoor sport are more limited. Darts takes place in the two Public houses and in the village hall, where badminton is also played. Other indoor sports can be played at the Sports Centre in Buckingham and also in Milton Keynes. Swimmers are able to go to the outdoor pool in Buckingham or to the leisure pool at Bletchley which is complete with palm trees. Tennis and Bowls can be played at Winslow or Buckingham, but for sports like ice skating, a trip to Oxford or Birmingham is required. Water Sports can be enjoyed at a developing centre in the north of Milton Keynes.
